path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

name.description: The name of the component. DON'T suffix it with '-dialog'
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the component?

inlineTemplate.description: Include template inline in the component.ts file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

createService.description: Create a http service associated with the store
